comment.author: 25695066@N00
comment._content: This photo depicts the crash of a Douglas RB-66C (USAF Ser. No. 54-460) at Chelveston, UK, on February 7, 1962. Four would perish in the crash, while three of the crew would survive. More on the incident here: becraft.info/becraft/i3914.htm www.rushden.org/plane.html
